human: Is it possible to reformat the data from this chart into a spreadsheet layout?

gpt:
Yes, you can represent the data in the chart in a spreadsheet format. Here's how the data from the image can be reformatted:

```
| Party             | Group               | Not a good job (%) | Good job (%) |
|-------------------|---------------------|--------------------|--------------|
| Democratic Party  | All Dem/Dem lean    | 30                 | 62          |
| Democratic Party  | Favor (69%)         | 18                 | 77          |
| Democratic Party  | Oppose (26%)        | 63                 | 30          |
| Republican Party  | All Rep/Rep lean    | 57                 | 29          |
| Republican Party  | Favor (41%)         | 63                 | 28          |
| Republican Party  | Oppose (56%)        | 54                 | 31          |
```

You can then input this data into any spreadsheet software like Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets, or LibreOffice Calc to further manipulate or visualize it.
